tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE level_designs (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_id INT,
    designer_name VARCHAR(100),
    design_data JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES game_maps(map_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gameplay_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    map_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(100),
    action_performed VARCHAR(100),
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (map_id) REFERENCES game_maps(map_id)
);
